name: Weeb's Wonka Game
description:
A fetishy adventure through a chocolate factory. 

  • A huge choose-your-own-adventure story of 80k+ words
  • 25 unique NPC endings, most with unique songs (if you're into that)
  • 18 player endings, written in second person
  • Varying triggers, puzzles, and interactions to explore

Character images from: https://www.deviantart.com/initforthepics/
